channel.title: Chapter 1: Introduction to the course on Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing (DL4NLP)
channel.description: Recent content in Chapter 1: Introduction to the course on Deep Learning for Natural Language Processing (DL4NLP)

item.title: Chapter 01.01: Introduction and Course Outline
item.description: This chapter introduces the people responsible for the course aims to answer all open question and should give an impression of the expected workload.

item.title: Chapter 01.02: Learning Paradigms
item.description: This chapter introduces different learning paradigms, such as embeddings, prompting and pre-training & finetuning a model

item.title: Chapter 01.03: NLP tasks
item.description: This chapter discusses various NLP tasks of different types (low- vs. high-level) and purely Linguistic task vs. more general classification task.

item.title: Chapter 01.04: Neural Probabalistic Language Model
item.description: This chapter introduces the Neural Probabalistic Language Model as a first approach to use Deep Neural Networks for language modelling.

item.title: Chapter 01.05: Word Embeddings
item.description: This chapter introduces Word Embeddings and discusses different methods of creating them, such as Word2Vec and CBOW.
